sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
    article.card.card-bg-wave(:style="{background: 'linear-gradient(133.72deg, #0097BC 7.93%, #2BBFB6 93.76%), url(' + require('@/assets/img/wave.png') + ')'}")
        .card__content
            .card__avatar
                img(src="@/assets/uploads/card-picture.png")
            router-link.card__hash(to="/") Educational
            h3.card__title Gecata by Movavi
            router-link.card__link(to="/")
                span Download
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: 'Card',
    data: function() {
        return {}
    }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss">
    .card {
        max-width: 676px;
        width: 100%;
        height: 306px;
        margin-bottom: 50px;
        position: relative;
        border-radius: 6px;
        text-align: center;

        &:before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            z-index: 0;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background-image: url('../../../assets/img/wave.png');
            background-repeat: no-repeat;
            background-position: center;
            background-size: cover;
        }

        &__content {
            position: relative;
            z-index: 2;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            padding: 37px;
        }

        &__avatar {
            width: 90px;
            height: 90px;
            margin: 0 auto 18px auto;

            img {
                width: 100%;
                height: 100%;
            }
        }

        &__hash {
            font-family: 'SFProDisplay';
            font-weight: normal;
            font-size: 15px;
            line-height: 22px;
            color: #59DDCD;
            margin-bottom: 5px;
        }

        &__title {
            font-family: 'SFProDisplay';
            font-weight: 600;
            // margin-bottom: 12px;
            font-size: 33px;
            line-height: 36px;
            letter-spacing: -0.6px;
            color: #fff;
        }

        &__link {
            width: 139px;
            height: 40px;
            background: #FFFFFF;
            box-sizing: border-box;
            border-radius: 100px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            font-family: 'SFProDisplay';
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 10px;
            line-height: 19px;
            letter-spacing: 1px;
            color: #37393E;
            cursor: pointer;
            margin: 0 auto;
            // position: relative;
            position: absolute;
            left: 50%;
            bottom: 38px;
            transform: translateX(-50%);

            span {
                position: relative;
                z-index: 2;
            }

            &:hover {
                background: transparent;

                &:after {
                    opacity: 1;
                }
            }

            &:after {
                content: '';
                width: 100%;
                height: 100%;
                border-radius: 100px;
                border: none;
                position: absolute;
                top: 0;
                left: 0;
                opacity: 0;
                background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85), rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85));
                // transition: .3s all ease;
            }
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 1200px) {
        .card {
            max-width: 600px;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 960px) {
        .card {
            max-width: 100%;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 640px) {
        .card {
            margin-bottom: 31px;
        }
    }
</style>
